notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: A.M., As.K, Ar.K and B.L.M. conceived and designed the research. N.K. and C.L. performed the experiments. M.G., D.M. and C.P. performed bioinformatics. N.K., C.L. and S.G. analyzed the data. A.M., As.K, N.K. wrote the manuscript. N.M. edited the manuscript. All authors have read and approved the final manuscript.
